result.execSummary:
The defendant Jonathan J Otto was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Vehicle Operator Flee/Elude Officer, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.04(3).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Defendant IS eligible for Challenge Incarceration and Substance Abuse Program.
Concurrent with: Milwaukee Co Case 15CF5445

superMiscConds.notes:
Court costs and DNA to be paid as a Condition of Extended Supervision.

  If Probation/Extended Supervision is revoked and/or a prison term ordered, outstanding financial obligations shall be collected pursuant to statutory provisions, including deductions from inmate prison monies.  If discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collections may include income assignment.
Follow through with any treatment/counseling recommended by Agent.

records.addlTxt: Letter from Atty Weathers advising the Office of the State Public Defender no longer represents Defendant
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Jonathan J Otto in court, in custody, with attorney M. Elizabeth Weathers.   David John Behm appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant enters a guilty plea to Count 1.  Court finds defendant guilty.
State makes sentencing argument.  Defense makes sentencing argument.  Defendant makes statement.  The Defendant was sentenced to the following:

IMPOSED SENTENCE of: 

3 YEARS IMPRISONMENT - Concurrent to Milwaukee Co case 15CF5445
  -  1 1/2 YEAR(S) OF INITIAL CONFINEMENT
  -  1 1/2 YEAR(S) OF EXTENDED SUPERVISION;

CONDITIONS OF EXTENDED SUPERVISION:  
*Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent;

COURT COSTS:  $268.00 (to be paid from prison wages and/or to be paid as a condition of extended supervision);

DNA SURCHARGE:  $250.00 (to be paid from prison wages and/or to be paid as a condition of extended supervision);
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

Defendant is eligible for Challenge Incarceration Program.
Defendant is eligible for Substance Abuse Program.

Felony warnings, voting rights and firearms warnings given.
Plea/sentencing hearing on May 1, 2017 at 01:30 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing on April 26, 2017 at 01:30 pm.
